attributes.action: mark cavendish to recognised in the new years honours
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
last year Mark won 4 stages in the Tour De France and then went to the olympics. he received no honour as the rest of the squad did. he has now increased his number of wins in the Tour, surpassing Chris Boardman (MBE).
I believe that such sporting achievements should be recognised

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
